title: Who would win?

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: Something I whipped up on my phone in about 10 minutes.

replies.body: One of the purple midgets does have a cannon the same size as her, while the buff guys just have a sword, an ax, and a mace.

The guy with the axe can dunk you, the sword man calls down a fucking massive magic sword from the sky, and the "man" with the mace is perhaps the most powerful magic user to ever walk Runeterra. My money is on the midgets with the weird lantern.6

> [{quoted}](name=INoble KnightI,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=LnAyAFbr,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-10-08T21:35:14.875+0000)
>
> The guy with the axe can dunk you, the sword man calls down a fucking massive magic sword from the sky, and the "man" with the mace is perhaps the most powerful magic user to ever walk Runeterra. My money is on the midgets with the weird lantern.6

Mordekaiser is super strong but his magic is nothing compared to Bard's magic. Bard is a timeless being tasked with protecting basically everything ever, and he does it pretty well. 
Bard has definitely been to Runeterra at least once, so Mordekaiser isn't the most powerful magic user to walk Runeterra.
He's the most powerful magic user to ever walk Runeterra because the real badasses float. {{champion:134}} {{champion:101}}
{{champion:35}} We all float down here

Yeah, sureâ€¦

{{champion:136}}
Well Bard is more of a force of nature. So i separate them in my head.
He said "Walk" Runeterra. Bard doesn't walk, he floats.

>the sword man calls down a fucking massive magic sword from the sky

he is also against magic.
That's not magic, it's justice incarnate.
Three slow-ass slugs with zero range VS a rapidly expanding flying squirrel with a hecking big gun.

> hecking

https://i.imgur.com/jFgKTIV.jpg[/img]
If this is a christian server, why doesn't the bear wear pants?
https://i.imgur.com/CzyT6dA.jpg?1[/img]
that's definitely the reason, seems like some one missed their private lessons with the Priest.
That midget has a 350 caliber handgun... So the midgets?

Dude, they got Lulu, they win.
She is crazy and the lunatics always win.
that tasted purple

> [{quoted}](name=Sinlaire,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=LnAyAFbr,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2017-10-09T03:58:17.154+0000)
>
> that tasted purple

she keeps asking me what rhymes with purple...
Its almost as if juggernauts are slow and kitable as a class weakness
This makes me sad.

If i have to fight i'd start out with darius flashing into them and pulling them to quickly apply the slow and Q if i can the trist will have to ult or jump away! now's the chance! the Garen with the silence comes in and goes for the lulu she will have to use her morph on him or get screwed now trist has to choose who to hit, darious or garen and she has no escape or ult maybe she can run away? but then BAM! mord comes with a third Q proc, ult, ignite and he has a {{item:3116}} OHH SHIT! lulu has to ult and shield no choice! but mord already casts his W on garen and his E on them. They're slow! and garen comes with the spin to win while darious already had caught up! they flash! but trist still has the ult and she is being slowed ohh shit! the three of them walk away all happy! we did a great job! the best we could have done! we got their {{summoner:4}} {{summoner:7}}  
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Unrelated, but I just realized that we need a "Hmm, I'm thinking" champion emoji, like Tris from the account security video.
wait that's a lantern?

Censer: a container in which incense is burned, typically during a religious ceremony. 

So I guess that's what he meant.
it always looked like a trophy cup to me
I mean..a trophy cup can be a container in which incense is burned. :)
